Anandha Krishnan's Summary

Senior Consultant with an experience of more than seven years in the creation of large-scale distributed object applications and the integration of disparate systems. He has worked on client sites on projects, which involved delivery, end- to-end project life cycles and several smaller consulting assignments that involved mentoring team with Agile/XP practices. He has also worked as a fulltime trainer within ThoughtWorks, which involved conducting training program for new employees at ThoughtWorks. He has also been a part of training programs conducted by ThoughtWorks at client site for short durations. Aside from ThoughtWorks internal and external training, Anandha Krishnan has also been involved in the Agile Community and different user groups on languages, OO Design patterns, testing techniques and development methodologies.

Currently he is working with product wing of ThoughtWorks, ThoughtWorks Studios which is the Agile Software Solutions and Training division of ThoughtWorks.

Interest is technical Product Development, delivery in niche domains, training and metoring on Software delivery practices main XP and Object Oriented Software development.

Specialties

Application development in Java, .Net and Ruby Platforms,Training/Coaching/Mentoring teams new to Agile/XP, Technical Product Development, Working with small team on large scale projects which involve very short, frequent delivery cycles, Test Automation, Build and Deployment techniques
